about_the_game:
SONGS

This is the official REC song pack, which contains mostly rock, the pack contains theme music about the video game (REC), I give you the pack for free so you can make the most of the soundtrack. Unfortunately, since I have no one to rely on for the songs, they were generated by AI, since I am a single developer, it is difficult for me to also do the soundtrack, so I wanted to make my first and only exception.

This is the official REC song pack, which contains mostly rock, the pack contains theme music about the video game (REC), I give you the pack for free so you can make the most of the soundtrack. name: Rec Soundtrack
short_description: Original Soundtrack of the REC Video Game
